articles.author: Nathaniel Weixel, Alejandra O'Connell-Domenech, Joseph Choi
articles.title: Many Americans don’t plan to get new COVID shot - The Hill
articles.description: Click in for more news from The Hill {beacon} Health Care Health Care   The Big Story  Most Americans plan to skip new COVID-19 shot: survey  As the temperature starts to drop, less than half of Americans plan on getting the new COVID-19 vaccine while more th…
articles.content:
Forty-three percent of respondents in the survey conducted by The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center said they have gotten a COVID-19 vaccine and plan on getting an updated inoculation.
